about_the_game:
Mini Dungeons is a turn-based Roguelite RPG set in a mysterious dungeon filled with dangers that lurk in every corner. Battle, Loot, and Upgrade your character and the companions you meet along the way but be wary, the dangers that lurk may prove challenging.

  • Turn Based Combat. Engage in turn based combat where every decision counts. Plan your moves carefully to outwit enemies and survive the dungeon.

  • Procedurally Generated Dungeons. Explore dynamically generated levels each time you enter the dungeon.

  • Loot and Upgrade. Discover and collect powerful weapons and armour during your journey. Equip them to strategically increase your chances of survival.

  • Release Sealed Potential. Releasing a character's sealed potential. Interact with an Altar to obtain powerful boons to unlock unique skills and abilities tailored for different playstyles.

  • Challenging Boss Fights. Confront challenging bosses that will test your skills and strategy. Adapt and overcome these difficult encounters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

short_description: Mini Dungeons is a Top Down RPG where you take control of Jimmy an adventurous Mouse looking for treasure deep within the depths of the dungeons. Along the journey in the depths - recruit various companions along the way, unlock new abilities, and get that sweet loot!
